name: custom-item-abstract
desc: Allows the user to add additional items to the context menu drop-down. This item can trigger javascript specified in its 'function' attribute specified below. Styling for all menu items can be customized using the context-menu 'item' attribute.

attrs.name: function
attrs.desc: Sets a JavaScript function/portion of code that will be executed when the respective menu item is selected.

attrs.name: id
attrs.desc: Sets the ID of the menu item.

attrs.name: rtl (right-to-left)
attrs.desc: Renders text right-to-left. Default value is false.

attrs.name: text
attrs.desc: Sets the text for the menu item.
